alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 2:53PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cochise County through 315 PM MST... At 252 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm south of Interstate 10 near the New Mexico state line, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly remote areas of east central Cochise County. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 385 and 391. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox
